items.name: The Grand Illusionist's Den
items.short_description: Step into a world where reality bends and magic is real! Witness breathtaking illusions and mind-bending tricks performed by San José's master magicians.
items.address: 170 S Market St, San José, CA 95113

items.name: Whimsical Wonders Magic Workshop
items.short_description: Not just a show, but an interactive experience! Kids learn simple magic tricks from friendly illusionists and even perform their own mini-show.

items.name: The Enigma Theater's Family Magic Hour
items.short_description: Enjoy an hour of dazzling magic designed for all ages, featuring vanishing acts, captivating card tricks, and playful audience participation. A perfect outing for the whole family!

items.name: Arcane Arts Pop-Up Parlor
items.short_description: A rotating pop-up experience featuring close-up magic and intimate illusions in various San José locations. Check their schedule for the next hidden venue!

items.name: Happy Hills Mini Fun Park
items.short_description: A delightful park specially designed for younger children, featuring gentle rides, a carousel, and a mini-rollercoaster. Perfect for first-time amusement park adventures!

items.name: Galaxy Arcade & Ride Zone
items.short_description: An indoor entertainment center combining classic arcade games with exciting kiddie rides, bumper cars, and a laser tag arena. Fun for all ages, rain or shine!
items.address: 2855 Stevens Creek Blvd, San José, CA 95128

items.name: Fiesta Island Splash & Spin
items.short_description: Beat the San José heat with a collection of refreshing water slides and spinning teacup rides. A small water park experience perfect for a sunny day out with the kids.
items.address: 1300 S Capitol Ave, San José, CA 95127

items.name: Starry Nights Ferris Wheel & Games
items.short_description: Enjoy classic carnival games, delicious treats, and a majestic Ferris wheel offering stunning views of San José. Open seasonally for family evenings.
items.address: 701 E Hedding St, San José, CA 95112

items.name: Brick City Builders Studio
items.short_description: An expansive indoor center where kids can unleash their creativity with millions of LEGO bricks. Build towering structures, intricate vehicles, and explore themed zones.

items.name: Junior Constructor's Yard
items.short_description: An outdoor adventure zone where kids can operate mini-diggers, cranes, and dump trucks in a safe, sand-filled construction site. Hard hats provided!

items.name: Robo-Builders Workshop
items.short_description: Delve into the world of robotics and engineering! Kids can design, build, and program their own LEGO robots in this hands-on educational workshop.

items.name: Master Builder's Cafe
items.short_description: Enjoy coffee and snacks while your kids build to their heart's content in a dedicated LEGO play area. Themed building challenges and competitions available!

items.name: Willow Creek Petting Farm
items.short_description: Get up close with friendly farm animals, enjoy pony rides, and explore charming farm trails. A gentle introduction to farm life for young children.
items.address: 1000 Silver Creek Rd, San José, CA 95121

items.name: Harvest Hollow Pumpkin Patch & Corn Maze
items.short_description: A quintessential autumn experience featuring acres of pumpkins, an exciting corn maze, hayrides, and festive activities for the whole family. Seasonal fun!
items.address: 800 Blossom Hill Rd, San José, CA 95123

items.name: Little Farmer's Discovery Tour
items.short_description: An educational farm experience where children learn about crops, sustainability, and where their food comes from through hands-on activities and guided tours.

items.name: Berry Patch & Play Barn
items.short_description: Pick your own fresh berries in season and then let the kids run wild in a charming play barn with slides and climbing structures. A sweet day out!

items.name: The Dream Weaver Puppet Theater
items.short_description: Experience enchanting stories brought to life by master puppeteers. Enjoy daily shows featuring whimsical characters and imaginative narratives perfect for young audiences.

items.name: Tiny Tumbleweeds Circus School
items.short_description: Kids can learn basic circus skills like juggling, acrobatics, and plate spinning in a fun, safe, and supportive environment. Unleash their inner performer!

items.name: Starlight Jamboree Mini Circus
items.short_description: A traveling mini-circus offering dazzling aerial acts, comical clowns, and incredible feats of strength, all presented in an intimate, family-friendly setting.
items.address: 200 E Santa Clara St, San José, CA 95113

items.name: Shadow Play Story Den
items.short_description: Discover the magic of shadow puppetry! Watch classic tales and new adventures unfold as silhouettes dance across the screen, captivating imaginations.

items.name: ImagineNation Kids Museum
items.short_description: A vibrant museum filled with hands-on exhibits encouraging exploration, discovery, and creative play for children of all ages. Spark curiosity in every corner!

items.name: Art & Tinker Studio
items.short_description: A unique children's museum focused on art creation and STEM tinkering. Kids can paint, sculpt, build, and experiment with various materials and tools.
items.address: 100 N Almaden Ave, San José, CA 95110

items.name: Tiny Town Role-Play Museum
items.short_description: An immersive museum where children can explore miniature versions of a grocery store, fire station, veterinary clinic, and more, encouraging imaginative role-play.
items.address: 400 E Santa Clara St, San José, CA 95113

items.name: Global Explorers Children's Hall
items.short_description: Journey around the world without leaving San José! This museum introduces children to diverse cultures, traditions, and geography through interactive exhibits and artifacts.

items.name: Lil' Kickers Soccer Dome
items.short_description: An indoor facility offering age-appropriate soccer classes, open play sessions, and friendly scrimmages for toddlers and young children. Score some fun!
items.address: 1500 S Bascom Ave, San José, CA 95128

items.name: Hoopsters Junior Court
items.short_description: A dedicated mini-basketball court where kids can learn fundamentals, practice their shots, and play in a supportive and fun environment. Dunk into action!

items.name: Grand Slam Kidsplex
items.short_description: Featuring mini-golf courses, batting cages scaled for kids, and a small arcade, this sports complex offers a variety of athletic fun for children.

items.name: Apex Junior Climbing Gym
items.short_description: A safe and exciting indoor climbing gym designed specifically for children, with colorful walls, auto-belays, and trained instructors to guide their vertical adventures.

items.name: Fairytale Forest Adventure Park
items.short_description: Step into a world of classic fairytales with gentle rides, storybook character meet-and-greets, and enchanting play areas for younger visitors.

items.name: Tiny Tides Water Fun Park
items.short_description: A splash-tastic water park offering slides, spray grounds, and shallow pools specifically designed for young children and their families to cool off and play.
items.address: 400 Blossom Hill Rd, San José, CA 95123

items.name: Construction Zone Playland
items.short_description: Kids become construction workers for a day! Drive mini-excavators, operate cranes, and build with giant blocks in this unique, interactive theme park.

items.name: Animal Kingdom Kids' Safari
items.short_description: Embark on a mini-safari ride, meet adorable animal characters, and enjoy animal-themed attractions in a park designed to spark a love for wildlife in young explorers.
items.address: 1200 S White Rd, San José, CA 95127

items.name: Jurassic Jungle Adventure
items.short_description: Travel back in time to an immersive park featuring life-sized animatronic dinosaurs, fossil digs, and thrilling, kid-friendly rides through prehistoric landscapes.

items.name: Dino Dig Site & Paleontology Lab
items.short_description: Aspiring paleontologists can unearth dinosaur bones in a giant sandpit, then learn about fossils and ancient creatures in an interactive lab.
items.address: 600 S Bascom Ave, San José, CA 95128

items.name: Prehistoric Play Zone
items.short_description: A dinosaur-themed playground featuring giant dino slides, climbable structures, and a lava-flow splash pad for active fun. Roar into playtime!.

items.name: Raptor Ridge Safari
items.short_description: Board an open-air vehicle for an exciting journey through a habitat filled with friendly (and sometimes roaring) dinosaur replicas. Discover various species!
items.address: 2000 Coyote Creek Dr, San José, CA 95111

items.name: Little Scientist Lab
items.short_description: A hands-on science center designed for young minds, offering interactive exhibits on physics, chemistry, and biology through fun experiments and demonstrations.
items.address: 150 W Santa Clara St, San José, CA 95113

items.name: Stargazer's Space Dome
items.short_description: Explore the cosmos in a state-of-the-art planetarium with immersive shows about stars, planets, and galaxies, plus interactive exhibits on space travel and astronomy.

items.name: Tech Explorers Workshop
items.short_description: A futuristic center where kids can dive into coding, robotics, and engineering challenges. Build circuits, program drones, and create digital art.
items.address: 200 River Oaks Pkwy, San José, CA 95134

items.name: Eco-Discovery Zone
items.short_description: Learn about environmental science and conservation through interactive exhibits on local ecosystems, water cycles, and sustainable practices. Become an eco-hero!
items.address: 300 W Hedding St, San José, CA 95110
